What did the staff at the Chancellor say was important after our long journey from the UK?
utterance.kb: We stayed at the Chancellor twice in December 2019 at the start and end of our trip to celebrate a BIG Birthday. I have to say this is a really lovely hotel. They strive to achieve a "family" feel and this really does work. Right int he middle of the City (with great views of Union Square) it felt like coming home after our busy days out. We had been given and up-grade to a suite in view of it being my birthday and this made it even more special I loved the fact that you could get coffee/tea in the bar and there were biscuits and, sometimes, muffins! We had breakfast there once (additional cost) and really enjoyed it (eggs made fresh to order). The staff were welcoming which was important after our long journey from the UK. I would definitely recommend this hotel and stay there again.

utterance.nlg: The staff were welcoming which was important after our long journey from the UK.

utterance.nlg: What is a value for Money Hotel?
utterance.kb: This is essentially a value for Money Hotel. Neat and clean rooms. Food is good. Service is decent. Staff is co-operative and helpful. Good place to stay at a budget price. will definitely like to visit again.
